Uses of Package
shef.mt.features.util

  • Packages that use shef.mt.features.util 
    Package Description
    shef.mt.features.impl  
    shef.mt.features.impl.bb
    This package contains implementations of Blackbox features.
    shef.mt.features.impl.gb
    This package contains implementations of Glassbox features
    shef.mt.features.util  
    shef.mt.tools
    This package contains wrappers for various pre-processing tools and Processor classes for interpreting the output of the tools
    shef.mt.tools.mqm  
    shef.mt.tools.mqm.core.fluency  
    shef.mt.tools.mqm.core.fluency.inconsistency  
    shef.mt.tools.mqm.core.fluency.register  
    shef.mt.tools.stf
    This package contains classes that provide access to the stanford parser output
    shef.mt.tools.term  
  • Classes in shef.mt.features.util used by shef.mt.features.impl 
    Class and Description
    Sentence
    Models a sentence as a span of text containing multiple information added by pre-processing tools
    It provides direct access to well used features of a sentence, such as its text, tokens, ngrams, phrases, but also allows any tool to add information related to the sentence via the setValue() method.
  • Classes in shef.mt.features.util used by shef.mt.features.impl.bb

    Class and Description
    FeatureArgumentException 
    Phrase
    Models a translation phrase as a span of text starting and ending at given positions in the input
